title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 24.6 - Notice and Filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 24.6 - Notice and Filing

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part, any required "notice" or "filing"
shall be in writing and shall be deemed effective upon actual receipt by the
intended recipient. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
24.6

Adopted

New

York State Register January 25, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 04, eff. 1/25/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
